00015   CellNeighbours::CellNeighbours( const lcio::LCObject *obj) {
00016 
00017     const lcio::LCGenericObject *genericObj = dynamic_cast<const lcio::LCGenericObject*> (obj) ;
00018 
00019     if (genericObj) {
00020       copyFromLCGenericObject( *genericObj );
00021     }
00022     else throw WrongDataFormatException("CellNeighbours::CellNeighbours(): cannot cast input to LCGenericObject");
00023   }

00030   void CellNeighbours::copyFromLCGenericObject( const lcio::LCGenericObject &obj ) {
00031 
00032     if (obj.getTypeName() != getTypeName() ) throw WrongDataFormatException("CellNeighbours::copyFromLCGenericObject(): LCGenericObject has different type name");
00033 
00034     for (int i = 0; i < obj.getNInt(); ++i ) _intVec.push_back( obj.getIntVal(i) );
00035     for (int i = 0; i < obj.getNFloat(); ++i ) _floatVec.push_back( obj.getFloatVal(i) );
00036     for (int i = 0; i < obj.getNDouble(); ++i ) _doubleVec.push_back( obj.getDoubleVal(i) );
00037 
00038     _isFixedSize = false;
00039     _dataDescription.str(obj.getDataDescription());
00040 
00041     loadValues();
00042   }
00043 
00044   CellNeighbours::CellNeighbours( const int cellID ) : lcio::LCGenericObjectImpl() {
00045     setIntVal( k_CellID, cellID);
00046   }
00047 
00048   void CellNeighbours::addNeighbour( const int cellID, const ENeighbourType type, const ENeighbourLocation location) {
00049     _neighbourVectors[type][location].push_back(cellID);
00050     saveValues();
00051   }
00052 
00053   int CellNeighbours::getCellID() const {
00054     return getIntVal( k_CellID );
00055   }

00057   const std::vector<int>& CellNeighbours::getNeighbours( const ENeighbourType type, const ENeighbourLocation location ) const {
00058     return _neighbourVectors[type][location];
00059   }

00061   const std::vector<int> CellNeighbours::getNeighbours( ) const {
00062 
00063     std::vector<int> result;
00064 
00065     for (unsigned int type = 0; type < k_NneighbourTypes; ++type)
00066       for (unsigned int location = 0; location < k_NneighbourLocations; ++location)
00067         result.insert(result.end(), _neighbourVectors[type][location].begin(), _neighbourVectors[type][location].end() );
00068 
00069     return result;
00070   }
00071

00084     std::vector<int> result;

00092   void CellNeighbours::loadValues() {
00093 
00094     int basePosition = k_NfixedNumbers; // fixed numbers are set and read directly
00095     int endOfSizes = k_NneighbourLocations*k_NneighbourTypes;
00096     int additionalElements = 0;
00097 
00098     for (unsigned int type = 0; type < k_NneighbourTypes; ++type)
00099       for (unsigned int location = 0; location < k_NneighbourLocations; ++location) {
00100         unsigned int nValues = getIntVal(basePosition+type*k_NneighbourLocations+location);
00101         for (unsigned int i = 0; i < nValues; ++i ) {
00102           _neighbourVectors[type][location].push_back( getIntVal(basePosition + endOfSizes + additionalElements + i) );
00103         }
00104         additionalElements += nValues;
00105       }
00106 
00107     for (unsigned int type = 0; type < k_NneighbourTypes; ++type)
00108       for (unsigned int location = 0; location < k_NneighbourLocations; ++location) {
00109         _dataDescription << ",i:" << neighbourTypeNames[type] << "_" <<  neighbourLocationNames[location] << "_size";
00110       }
00111 
00112     for (unsigned int type = 0; type < k_NneighbourTypes; ++type)
00113       for (unsigned int location = 0; location < k_NneighbourLocations; ++location)
00114         for (unsigned int i = 0; i < _neighbourVectors[type][location].size(); ++i ) {
00115           _dataDescription << ",i[" <<_neighbourVectors[type][location].size() << "]";
00116         }
00117 
00118 
00119   }
00120 
00121   void CellNeighbours::saveValues() {
00122     _dataDescription.str("");
00123 
00124     int runningPos = k_NfixedNumbers; // fixed numbers are set and read directly
00125 
00126     _dataDescription << "i:" << neighbourFixedNames[k_CellID];
00127 
00128     for (unsigned int type = 0; type < k_NneighbourTypes; ++type)
00129       for (unsigned int location = 0; location < k_NneighbourLocations; ++location) {
00130         _dataDescription << ",i:" << neighbourTypeNames[type] << "_" <<  neighbourLocationNames[location] << "_size";
00131         setIntVal( runningPos++, _neighbourVectors[type][location].size() );
00132       }
00133 
00134     for (unsigned int type = 0; type < k_NneighbourTypes; ++type)
00135       for (unsigned int location = 0; location < k_NneighbourLocations; ++location)
00136         for (unsigned int i = 0; i < _neighbourVectors[type][location].size(); ++i ) {
00137           _dataDescription << ",i[" <<_neighbourVectors[type][location].size() << "]";
00138         }
00139 
00140   }
